attributes.title: Goa Thrills & Wild Trails
attributes.about: Calling all adventure enthusiasts! Get ready for an action-packed vacation with our "Goa Thrills & Wild Trails" tour package. Explore the adrenaline-pumping side of Goa, from trekking in the Western Ghats to thrilling jeep safaris in the heart of nature. Get ready for an adventure like no other.

tour_details.tour_details:
- Arrival at Dabolim Airport or Madgaon Railway Station.
- Check into your adventure-focused hotel in North Goa.
- Evening at leisure to relax and prepare for your thrilling journey.
- Dinner at the hotel's restaurant.
- Overnight stay in North Goa.

included.text: Transportation For Sightseeing (A/C Will Be Turned Off In Hills)

excluded.text: Personal Expenses (E.G., Laundry, Calls, Room Service)
